author: Peter Van Buren
title: The Coronavirus Monsters on Main Street
description: In the frantic search for someone or something to blame, Trump gets the brunt. But we had two pandemics to get this right. The post The Coronavirus Monsters on Main Street appeared first on The American Conservative.
content: In the frantic search for someone or something to blame, Trump gets the brunt. But we had two pandemics to get this right.“There are weapons that are simply thoughts, attitudes, prejudices, to be found only in the minds of men. For the record, prejudices can … [+8922 chars]
